dcterms:description: The LEVIR-CC dataset consists of 10,077 image pairs and 5 captions each describing the changes happening between the two images covering the same area. Half of the pairs do not have any significant change, while the other half portrays changes such as new buildings or roads being built. The descriptions often include detailed spatial references.
dcterms:title: LEVIR-CC
